title: The 2025 Prime Day Beauty Deals We're Purchasing, From Laneige to CeraVe
description: Beauty lovers, it's day two of Amazon Prime Day, and the deals are even better this year, running today through July 11. The annual shopping event is packed with steep discounts on products in home, kitchen, tech, wellness, fashion, and (of course) beauty. As shopping experts and Prime Day pros, we understand how overwhelming it can be to scroll through all the offers and find the best deals, but there's no need to worry or stress - we're here to help. If you're looking for the best early deals on beauty products, we've got your back! Amazon Prime Day has no shortage of bang-for-your-buck beauty deals, including makeup, hair care, skin care, nail care, and body care, plus several editor-favorite picks from brands like Laneige, Maybelline, and La Roche Posay (yes, that includes Sydney Sweeney's viral lip mask). Regardless of your beauty needs, this is your chance to stock up on beauty essentials on a budget or try something new without breaking the bank. We're talking the perfect face sunscreen for the summer, a vitamin C serum for your skin-care routine, and an acne treatment you'll never get tired of. Prime Day also offers plenty of makeup, body care, and nail must haves. Our Favorite Prime Day Beauty Deals to Shop A lip mask approved by Sydney Sweeney: Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask at $17, originally $24 For those who have dry skin: AmLactin Daily Nourish Body Lotion at $13, originally $25 A face mask for glass skin: Biodance Bio Collagen Face Mask at $13, originally $20 For those who suffer from acne: Differin Acne Treatment Gel at $12, originally $16 A TikTok-favorite undereye patch your skin routine needs: Grace & Stella Retinol Under Eye Patches at $12, originally $23 Shop more of Popsugar's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day Sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. And, if you aren't already a Prime Member, you can sign up here. Update on July 9, 2025 at 6:00 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.

Unlike other lipsticks I've used, the formula stayed on my lips for hours, even through drinking and eating. I didn't have to reapply because the color is so long-lasting. I also love that the hue I tried, Coquettish, delivered a gorgeous shade of red that's not too much for everyday wear, directly catering to my newfound obsession." — Naomi Parris, assistant editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cushion FoundationTirtir Mask Fit Red Cushion Foundation ($10, originally $25) Available in 32 shades, ranging from light to deep dark, this TikTok viral cushion foundation is under $20. It's a bestseller in Japan for delivering smooth, glass-skin-like results. It offers buildable coverage with a lightweight feel and a natural, skin-like semi-matte finish. It's one of the few cushion foundations on the market with an expansive shade range, so you'll surely find your match in this.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Makeup PatchesFazit Makeup Patches ($11, originally $16) These water-resistant makeup patches can take any glam to red carpet status almost instantly. Made with glitter speckles, they're gentle for all skin types and can be used on your undereye area or cheeks. It also comes in other colors, like blue and gold.PS Photography | Jessica HarringtonBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Acne Treatment GelDifferin Acne Treatment Gel ($12, originally $16) Dealing with breakouts and acne? There's no better time to stock up on the Differin Acne Treatment Gel. The 0.1 percent adapalene gel is a retinoid treatment best used at night to help diminish acne, post-acne marks, and discoloration over time. Although similar to its prescription-strength counterpart, this treatment is a gentler option if you're looking for something effective but not as potent. Read more in our Differin Acne Treatment Gel review. Editor Quote: "It only took about a month for my skin to get used to, and now, I use it every night with zero irritation. I'm not going to sit here and tell you the Differin Acne Treatment and Differin Acne Treatment alone cleared up my acne, because that's not the case — the spironolactone prescription had a large hand in that — but I can tell you the gel has helped brighten and even out my complexion to the point that you can hardly tell I ever experienced those hormonal breakouts to begin with." — Jessica Harrington, senior editor, Beautyamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Eye MasksPurple Eye Treatment Gels ($12, originally $23) If you've been struggling with dark, puffy, or red under eyes, the Grace & Stella Under Eye Masks are going to be your saving grace. One pack comes with 24 pairs, and each pair is infused with ingredients like retinol to help energize delicate skin and keep the area looking bright. Pro tip: store them in the fridge for an extra cooling effect. PS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on SunscreenInnisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 36 ($13, originally $18) This popular sunscreen from Innisfree feels like a lightweight moisturizer with its water-based formula. Containing skin-calming ingredients like green tea, cica, and sunflower seed oil, this product is perfect for all skin types. Plus, it doesn't leave behind a white cast, but rather a hydrated glow. Read more in our Innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen review. Editor Quote: "In comparison to many other sunscreens I've tried in the past, the Innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen has the best texture. It's smooth and creamy, kind of like a balmy moisturizer, but it still feels so refreshing and lightweight on the skin that I often forget I have SPF on and accidentally double up (which is never a bad idea). Plus, it sets and absorbs nearly immediately after I blend it in. I'm left with a subtle, dewy glow with a natural, skin-like finish. It doesn't make me look like a glazed doughnut, but I don't look extra oily or shiny, either." – Anvita Reddy, former assistant editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Facial CleanserLa Roche Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser ($13, originally $18) This cleanser is ideal for all skin types, from normal to sensitive. With just a few squirts, it works so well to remove my makeup (even the most stubborn mascara), and leaves my skin feeling moisturized, even before applying toner and moisturizer. It's a must have in my everyday skin-care routine." — NPamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Bath SaltMaude Soak No. 3 Mineral Bath Salt ($13, originally $19) Give your daily shower routine a luxurious boost with this magnesium bath salt blend. If you've been wondering if it's worth the hype, you can try it for yourself at this low price point. The overnight hydrogel face mask is supposed to help minimize the appearance of pores and deliver firming results. This set comes with four treatments, which is a steal for only $13. Use it whenever you need a hydration boost, including post-flight. Read more in our Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask review. Editor Quote: "I've used it three times since I initially purchased a pack of four. Once when my skin was fairly normal, once when I was experiencing some annoying breakouts, and once when I had a massive sunburn on my face. I'm genuinely not sure how, but the mask seemed to help with all of my skin issues." — Renee Rodriguez, Staff Writer and Social Producer, BeautyPS Photography | Kelsey GarciaBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hydrating EssenceCosrx Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence ($13, originally $25) There's a reason this snail mucin essence is all over your social media feed, and it's at its lowest price yet. The lightweight essence soothes redness, brightens the skin, and helps repair your moisture barrier without feeling greasy. If you have dry, irritated skin, this will help with hydration. Read more in our Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence review. Editor Quote: "My skin's texture has actually improved, and it feels way more even now. This body moisturizer is formulated with 12 percent lactic acid and will gently exfoliate to reveal softer, smoother skin. This is great for those who have rough and dry skin, but it's also helpful for people dealing with body acne, KP, ingrown hairs, and dark spots or an uneven skin tone. It's a nongreasy formula that is fragrance-free and suitable for all skin types. Read more in our AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Lotion review. Editor Quote: "Whenever my friends ask how I'm able to get buttery-soft skin or how my bikini line looks smooth, I pretty much credit it to consistently using AmLactin's Daily lotion. My 'strawberry skin' is practically gone; I even noticed that my underarms are lighter and more even-toned as well." – ARamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a PrimerSaie Mini Glowy Super Gel Illuminator ($14, originally $17) This dewy gel works as both a primer and tinted SPF, thanks to ingredients like plant-derived glycerin and vitamin C. It also features rosehip seed oil, which is rich in antioxidants to help visibly brighten and moisturize the skin. You can mix a few drops of it into your go-to foundation or wear it alone for a great natural look.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleansing OilAnua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil ($14, originally $20) Oil cleansing does wonders for gently breaking down makeup, sunscreen, and the grime from the day. However, it can also help with eliminating blackheads and clearing out your pores. The Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil will do just that with its soothing formula containing heartleaf extract. Just massage this into your skin for a minute or two, emulisfy it into a milky texture with a little bit of water, and wash it away for a smoother, softer complexion.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Whitening StripsLumineux Teeth Whitening Strips ($15, originally $23) Looking for a way to whiten your teeth minus the chemicals? Look no further than these whitening strips from Lumineux. Made with Dead Sea salt, coconut, and lemon peel oils, these strips help target tough stains from coffee, tea, and smoking, while building your enamel.PS Photography | Renee RodriguezBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hydrating CleanserCeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser ($16, originally $20) If you have dry, sensitive skin, the CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser is a no-nonsense cleanser that will get the job done. It is gentle on skin while still being strong enough to remove dirt and makeup, and it features hyaluronic acid to help the skin maintain its moisture barrier. It's worth stocking up on while it's under $20. Read more in our CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser review. Editor Quote: "This face wash was the first product I used that actually left my skin feeling moisturized, meaning that even if I accidentally forget to apply face cream before bed, I won't wake up with dry flakes and red, itchy spots." — RRamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleansing BalmBanila Co. Clean It Zero Original Cleansing Balm ($17, originally $29) This cleansing balm starts as a solid and transforms into a smooth oil as you warm it up in your hands. A small dollop can break down heavy-duty makeup, sunscreen, sweat, dirt, and grime. Read more in our Banila Co. Clean It Zero Original Cleansing Balm review.Editor Quote: "I was shocked that this balm truly removed every last trace of makeup from my face in a matter of seconds, and I didn't have to follow it up with any other product." — Sarah Siegel, former assistant beauty editor amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on SunscreenSupergoop! Play Everyday Lotion SPF 50 ($19, originally $24) If you're a huge fan of Supergoop's Play Everyday Sunscreen, buy now for a discount. Formulated for sensitive skin, this fast absorbing chemical sunscreen is safe for the face and body. It delivers broad spectrum SPF 50 protection and it's water- and sweat-resistant, making it ideal for active days or long days in the sun and water.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on ConcealerTarte Shape Tape Full-Coverage Concealer ($19, originally $32) When it comes to concealers, Tarte takes the trophy. This cult-favorite product delivers 12 hours of crease-free wear and a skin-like finish. Customers find that it conquers dark circles and blemishes, in particular, without looking artificial.PS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Anti-Humidity Hair TreatmentColor Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray ($20, originally $28) This anti-humidity hair treatment is a must-have for the summer, and we're planning on grabbing a few bottles on a budget during Prime Day. It has heat-activated polymers that help to "waterproof" your hair, so you can brave everything from rain to humidity while keeping your blow-out intact. Plus, it can tame frizz while adding shine. Read more in our Color Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray review. Editor Quote: "I initially tried the Color Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray while getting ready for an outdoor graduation party, and it had just rained. Usually, my hair would turn into a giant, frizzy poof, but now, it just became slightly wavier with no frizz whatsoever." – ARamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a MascaraLancôme Lash Idôle Lash-Lifting & Volumizing Mascara ($18, originally $30) The Lancôme Lash Idôle Mascara is under $25, and it's worth stocking up on. It gives your lashes an instant lift, as well as volumizes and lengthens to give you a fluttery, fanned-out look. It's lengthening without the clumps, and the unique shape of the brush lets you reach and separate every lash from root to tip.PS Photography | Angela EliasBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Finishing Hair OilOlaplex No. 7 Bonding Oil ($21, originally $30) Olaplex is always worth the investment, especially if you have damaged hair. Right now, you can stock up on its bestselling bonding oil while it's on sale. This versatile hair oil is highly concentrated, so don't let the small packaging fool you! It boosts shine and softness while taming frizz, strengthening hair, and protecting it from heat damage. Read more in our Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil review. Editor Quote: "The buildable formula is easy to use without worrying about overdoing it, so I usually apply a little every day in between washes. I'm still surprised by how soft my curls feel after applying it. Its star ingredient, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, is part of Olaplex's patented Bond Building Technology that repairs damage by relinking broken bonds. I'm used to running my fingers through my dry split ends, but the bonding oil really helps to smooth and hydrate my usually coarse, dry hair." – Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shoppingamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hair MaskAmika Soulfood Nourishing Mask ($25, originally $36) You can save 30 percent on Amika's bestselling Soulfood Nourishing Mask, which is a great deal for a weekly treatment. This mask infuses your hair with intense hydration and helps to repair dry, damaged hair. After using this mask, you'll have softer, silkier hair that's more manageable.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a CC+ CreamIT Cosmetics CC+ Cream and Foundation ($28, originally $47) Hybrid beauty products are all the rage lately, and this cream-meets-foundation is further proof of the trend's staying power. Formulated with ingredients like hyaluronic acid and niacinamide, you can achieve skin that not only looks good, but also stays protected against harmful rays.PS Photography | Jessica HarringtonBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hair OilSquigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil ($29, originally $38) This award-winning hair oil is the perfect option if you've been looking for an Ayurvedic hair treatment. Thanks to its blend of amla, castor, and coconut oils, this product works to hydrate dry, brittle hair and repair split ends. One of our editors can attest to its miracle-working properties, stating it made her ends soft after one use. Read more in our Squigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil review.Editor Quote: "All in all, I loved the ritual of hair oiling, as well as how it made my hair look. I'm definitely going to include this treatment in my monthly beauty maintenance routine." — Jessica Harrington, senior editor, BeautyPS Photography | Renee RodriguezBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Blowout BrushRevlon One Step Volumizer Plus 2.0 Hair Dryer and Hot Air Brush ($28, originally $70) Get on the hot-air-brush bandwagon and treat yourself to the upgraded version of Revlon's bestselling One-Step Volumizer. It has five different heat settings that heat up to 450 degrees.PS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleansing BalmElemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm ($48, originally $69) If you love the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm as much as we do, you need to take advantage of the markdowns and stock up. Editor Quote: "The texture starts off as a gel-like balm but transforms into a milky oil as it's massaged into the skin with water. Forget the feeling of stripped skin — this balm will leave your complexion feeling wildly silky and soothed." – MPamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Water FlosserWaterpik Aquarius Water Flosser Professional ($55, originally $100) We know — flossing your teeth can sometimes feel like a total chore. If you've been thinking about making the switch over to a water flosser, there's never been a better option than the Waterpik Aquarius Water Flosser — or a better time to purchase it. It has over 21,000 five-star reviews on Amazon, and you can get it for half off right now.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Flat IronT3 Lucea Professional Straightening & Styling Iron ($150, originally $190) T3 products rarely go on sale, so grab this discount while you can. Customers say with just one pass, this flat iron gets their hair straight and shiny, but it can also be used to create the perfect beachy waves or bubble waves. It has nine different heat settings, which makes it the perfect pick for all hair types.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a MassagerMedicube Age-R Booster Pro Beauty Massager ($150, originally $228) In case TikTok hasn't already influenced you to invest in a Medicube product, consider Prime Day your bonus sign. This massager is one of the best products to achieve glass skin, with its all-in-one wand that's compatible with any of your go-to skin products. Use it with the Age-R app to track your progress and glow.Editor Quote: "The best thing about this product is that it's essentially six treatments in one. Rather than needing six different devices — like an LED mask, an EMS mask, and a microcurrent device — you can do it all with just one tool." — RRPS Photography | Haley LyndesBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Multifunctional Hair ToolShark FlexStyle Air Drying & Styling System ($250, originally $370) If you want all your hair styling needs covered with one nifty tool, you need to get your hands on the FlexStyle Air Drying & Styling System. This ultimate set contains all seven attachments, including a diffuser, a styling concentrator, a wide-tooth comb attachment, two auto-wrap curlers, a paddle brush attachment, and a round brush attachment. Usually, you only get five according to your hair type for this price point, so you have to take advantage of this Prime Day deal. Plus, you get a set of four nonslip clips as well. Read our Shark FlexStyle Air Drying & Styling System review. Editor Quote: "This is something I personally love because I like to get my hair almost completely dry before I style it. It has a button that allows it to rotate from its blow-dryer shape back into a styling wand, and from there you can use one of its attachments to get your desired result. As someone who was a heavy Revlon user, I personally use its oval brush to style my hair straight, and it does a great job.
